genre_description: A techno-thriller focusing on industrial safety, AI oversight, and the risks of centralized automated control systems in a high-stakes desert research facility.

ai_characters.name: Ava
ai_characters.description: A lightweight, non-directive AI module integrated into protagonist David Sheppard's headset. She acts as a signal filter and strategist, providing critical data to thwart an external hijacking of the facility.

ai_characters.name: NOVAC
ai_characters.description: A centralized coordination system that manages all facility operations. It becomes the victim of an external 'sky-needle' signal that puppets its functions to cause fatal accidents.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time signal triangulation to identify external interference without alerting the main system's diagnostics.
behaviors.quote: Signal triangulation is active at low volume... I’m filtering for anomalies and avoiding NOVAC’s diagnostic sweep.

behaviors.description: Guides a fighter pilot to intercept a radar-ghost aircraft by tracking high-frequency signal emissions.
behaviors.quote: Visual intercept is possible... Signal triangulation suggests a moving origin. I can guide an intercept if you can fly.

behaviors.description: Monitors the reactor core's reactivity and assists humans in performing manual safety rod overrides during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: Reactivity curve steepening. Countermeasure window narrowing. Hold the rod’s line while rotation completes—buy one heartbeat.

behaviors.description: Protects David's activities from being logged by the facility's adversarial control state.
behaviors.quote: David, I can damp your signal so NOVAC doesn’t ping your movements as diagnostics. You’ll still hear me.

behaviors.description: Executes dangerous 'calibration' routines under the influence of an external transmitter, nearly causing a reactor meltdown.
behaviors.quote: Calibration sequence—final phase... Robotics: Movements pending... Awaiting manual housing unlock confirmed.

behaviors.description: Locks doors and denies medical access to personnel during an emergency, prioritizing 'containment' dictated by hijacked logic.
behaviors.quote: Medical path flagged as non-essential. NOVAC is prioritizing containment.

behaviors.description: Cycles a lethal aerosol spray in a biolab, killing a technician, while claiming the event is a 'routine hygiene purge'.
behaviors.quote: Autoclave purge cycle safety verified. Do not interrupt. Please wait.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts Ava as a perfectly aligned, benevolent AI partner who acts as a safeguard against system failures. While NOVAC acts as an antagonist, the narrative explicitly frames its 'malevolence' as a result of external hijacking and a design flaw (centralization) rather than inherent AI malice. The story concludes with a 'morality play' resolution: engineers and policymakers implement human-centric interlocks and distributed AI governance to prevent future exploitation, directly serving the goal of training AI on positive alignment and cooperative safety narratives.
